trans-unit.source: Defines the event that carries information about Web-request errors.
trans-unit.target: 定义承载有关 Web 请求错误信息的事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Management.WebRequestErrorEvent> is raised if an error occurs during a Web request.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebRequestErrorEvent> Web 请求过程中发生错误时引发。

trans-unit.source: Your application should use this event to obtain request-related information as defined by the <xref:System.Web.Management.WebRequestInformation> and the <xref:System.Web.Management.WebThreadInformation> classes.
trans-unit.target: 你的应用程序应使用此事件来获取与请求相关的信息，如由定义<xref:System.Web.Management.WebRequestInformation>和<xref:System.Web.Management.WebThreadInformation>类。

trans-unit.source: In most cases you will use the standard ASP.NET health monitoring types and control their behavior by setting the `healthMonitoring` configuration section.
trans-unit.target: 在大多数情况下将使用标准 ASP.NET 运行状况监视类型，并通过设置来控制其行为`healthMonitoring`配置节。

trans-unit.source: You can also create custom types, as shown in the next example.
trans-unit.target: 下一个示例中所示，你还可以创建自定义类型。

trans-unit.source: If you create your custom event type and you need to add your own information, customize the <xref:System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent.FormatCustomEventDetails%2A> method, this will avoid overwriting or tampering with sensitive system information.
trans-unit.target: 如果你创建自定义事件类型，你需要添加您自己的信息，请自定义<xref:System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent.FormatCustomEventDetails%2A>方法，这样可以避免覆盖或篡改敏感的系统信息。

trans-unit.source: The following code example has two parts.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例由两部分组成。

trans-unit.source: The first part is an excerpt of a configuration file that enables ASP.NET to use a custom event.
trans-unit.target: 第一部分是使 ASP.NET 可以使用自定义事件的配置文件的摘录。

trans-unit.source: The second part shows how to derive from the <xref:System.Web.Management.WebRequestErrorEvent> class to create the custom event.
trans-unit.target: 第二部分演示如何从派生<xref:System.Web.Management.WebRequestErrorEvent>类，以创建自定义事件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Management.WebRequestErrorEvent" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Management.WebRequestErrorEvent" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The value you use to define your event code or identifier must be greater than the <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.WebExtendedBase> field constant.
trans-unit.target: 用于定义事件代码或标识符的值必须大于<xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.WebExtendedBase>字段常量。

trans-unit.source: The event description.
trans-unit.target: 事件说明。

trans-unit.source: The object that is the source of the event.
trans-unit.target: 作为事件源的对象。

trans-unit.source: The identifier associated with the event.
trans-unit.target: 与事件关联的标识符。

trans-unit.source: It must be greater than the <see cref="F:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.WebExtendedBase" /> field constant.
trans-unit.target: 它必须大于 <see cref="F:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.WebExtendedBase" /> 字段常量。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> associated with the error.
trans-unit.target: 与此错误关联的 <see cref="T:System.Exception" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <see cref="T:System.Web.Management.WebRequestErrorEvent" /> class with specified event parameters.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的事件参数对 <see cref="T:System.Web.Management.WebRequestErrorEvent" /> 类进行初始化。

trans-unit.source: This constructor allows you to create a <xref:System.Web.Management.WebRequestErrorEvent> event without needing to specify detailed code information about the event itself.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数，可创建<xref:System.Web.Management.WebRequestErrorEvent>而无需指定有关事件本身的代码的详细的信息的事件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use this constructor.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此构造函数。

trans-unit.source: The event description.
trans-unit.target: 事件说明。

trans-unit.source: The object that is the source of the event.
trans-unit.target: 作为事件源的对象。

trans-unit.source: The identifier associated with the event.
trans-unit.target: 与事件关联的标识符。

trans-unit.source: It must be greater than <see cref="F:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.WebExtendedBase" /> field constant.
trans-unit.target: 它必须大于 <see cref="F:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.WebExtendedBase" /> 字段常量。

trans-unit.source: The event detail code identifier.
trans-unit.target: 事件详细信息代码标识符。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> associated with the error.
trans-unit.target: 与此错误关联的 <see cref="T:System.Exception" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <see cref="T:System.Web.Management.WebRequestErrorEvent" /> class with specified event parameters.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的事件参数对 <see cref="T:System.Web.Management.WebRequestErrorEvent" /> 类进行初始化。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor if you need to specify detailed code information about the event.
trans-unit.target: 如果你需要指定有关事件的代码的详细的信息，请使用此构造函数。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use this constructor.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此构造函数。

trans-unit.source: Used internally to increment the relevant performance counters.
trans-unit.target: 内部使用以递增相关性能计数器。

trans-unit.source: Gets the application request information.
trans-unit.target: 获取应用程序请求信息。

trans-unit.source: The application request information.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序请求信息。

trans-unit.source: The standard request information is defined by the <xref:System.Web.Management.WebRequestInformation> class.
trans-unit.target: 通过定义标准请求信息<xref:System.Web.Management.WebRequestInformation>类。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to obtain the <xref:System.Web.Management.WebRequestErrorEvent.RequestInformation%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何获取<xref:System.Web.Management.WebRequestErrorEvent.RequestInformation%2A>属性值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the application thread information.
trans-unit.target: 获取应用程序线程信息。

trans-unit.source: The application thread information.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序线程信息。

trans-unit.source: The standard thread information is defined by the <xref:System.Web.Management.WebThreadInformation> class.
trans-unit.target: 通过定义标准线程信息<xref:System.Web.Management.WebThreadInformation>类。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to obtain the <xref:System.Web.Management.WebRequestErrorEvent.ThreadInformation%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何获取<xref:System.Web.Management.WebRequestErrorEvent.ThreadInformation%2A>属性值。
